title: Techsmith Snagit v13.0.1 build 6326 Incl Keygen-F4CG [TRTKR]
description:
Techsmith Snagit

Techsmith Snagit - offers unlimited possibilities for capturing images - the entire screen, one or several windows and graphical objects (icons, screen buttons, toolbars, menus, etc.), arbitrary area or complex shape (polygon, ellipse, rectangle with rounded corners), full-screen window the DOS-programs and DirectX application window (games, video players), the program can receive images from scanners or digital cameras with TWAIN interface to capture a background image of your Windows desktop and the contents of the clipboard, and import icons from EXE and DLL-files. 

Magnifier will help you select the capture area with pixel precision, and a preview with the built-in editor allows bitmap images to quickly add explanatory labels and save the image to a file. Additionally, SnagIt is able to store any type of files from web-sites with the ability to specify the level of nesting pages, and is able to record what is happening on the screen to AVI format videos. Program SnagIt can capture on a schedule or with a given frequency, and also allows you to capture images without the mouse cursor. 

Capture window with scroll bars 
â€¢ The developers realized SnagIt invaluable function - Capture windows and screen objects with scroll bars. Let's say you need a picture of a window, the contents of which do not fit on the screen at all desire. What to do in such a situation? Just take pictures of it in parts and glue together the fragments in the graphical editor. And it offers SnagIt? It's very simple - select the image source desired type of display object scrollable initialize capture, scroll through the contents of a window or wait until the program will do it themselves, and get ready image. 

Capturing text 
â€¢ You can extract the text dialog box, which can not be copy, or create a text list of files displayed in Windows Explorer. 

Automatic processing and saving images 
â€¢ SnagIt can automatically process the captured screen with built-in filters to change the size and scale of the image, set the desired color depth, perform color correction, add frames, shadows, watermark, header, and the edges of the trim effects. The program also allows you to automatically send the processed image to the clipboard, the printer, the selected application, send it by e-mail or instant messaging software, as well as stored in a specified file format, and file name is based on customizable templates. 

create profiles 
â€¢ Office of the capture parameters, processing and output screen shots by using profiles SnagIt settings. You can create several different profiles to quickly capture, or select the desired profile using the pop-up panel SnagIt OneClick or the main application window. In most cases, SnagIt allows you to fully automate the process of preparing screen shots - you just select the profile that contains the required parameters capture, processing and preservation of images, and perform image capture or desired obekta- rest of the program will do for you. 

Built-in raster editor SnagIt Editor 
â€¢ Imposing a rich text - color, font, transparency, shadow volume. 
â€¢ Image processing - rotate, crop, zoom. 
â€¢ Brushes, stamps, sprays, pencils, lines, arrows, geometric shapes, pipette to capture color, figure the allocation of areas of the image. 
â€¢ More than 50 levels of undo. 
â€¢ Record the finished image to a file, copy to clipboard, send to print or e-mail. 

Built-in vector editor SnagIt Studio 
â€¢ Adding explanations, comments, braces callouts and labels, stamps, arrows, icons, connecting lines, etc. with ready-made library of vector elements. Contains leveling function, placement, resizing, rotation, shading, and other operations on objects. 

Built-in image gallery SnagIt Catalog Browser 
â€¢ In addition to quickly view can also be used for group and batch rename / convert files using the names of templates and built-in filters SnagIt (resizing, cropping, rotation, change the depth and color correction, add frames, watermarks, background etc. ). In addition, it contains powerful tools for creating web-image galleries. 

SnagIt Plug-ins and built-in COM-server 
â€¢ Plug-ins for Internet Explorer and Firefox, as well as Microsoft Word programs, PowerPoint, Excel, Microsoft Outlook, and Adobe FrameMaker provide quick and easy capture and paste images directly into applications. Built-in COM-server allows you to manage the work program SnagIt using Visual Basic and VB Script, as well as applications from Visual C ++. 

System Requirements:

Microsoft Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 SP1 (32-bit and 64-bit), or Windows Server 2012 R2
.NET 4.6 or later
2.4 GHz single core processor (dual core i5 required for video capture) 
1 GB of RAM (4 GB required for video capture)
400 MB of hard-disk space for program installation
Video capture on Windows N requires the Media Feature Pack for Windows N
